017package ninja.leaping.configurate.attributed;
018
019import ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationNode;
020import ninja.leaping.configurate.ConfigurationOptions;
021import ninja.leaping.configurate.commented.CommentedConfigurationNode;
022import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.NonNull;
023import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
024
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.function.Consumer;
028
029/**
030 * A configuration node that can have both comments and attributes attached to it.
031 */
032public interface AttributedConfigurationNode extends CommentedConfigurationNode {
033
034    /**
035     * Create a new node with no parent and the tag name {@code root}
036     *
037     * @return a new node
038     */
039    @NonNull
040    static AttributedConfigurationNode root() {
041        return root("root", ConfigurationOptions.defaults());
042    }
043
044    /**
045     * Create a new node with no parent and the tag name {@code root}, and perform an action with it in scope
046     *
047     * @param action action to perform to initialize the created node
048     * @return a new node
049     */
050    static AttributedConfigurationNode root(Consumer<? super AttributedConfigurationNode> action) {
051        return root("root", action);
052    }
053
054    /**
055     * Create a new node with no parent and a specified tag name.
056     *
057     * @param tagName The name of the tag to be used to represent this node
058     * @return a new node
059     */
060    @NonNull
061    static AttributedConfigurationNode root(@NonNull String tagName) {
062        return root(tagName, ConfigurationOptions.defaults());
063    }
064
065    /**
066     * Create a new node with no parent and a specified tag name, and perform an action with it in scope
067     *
068     * @param tagName The name of the tag to be used to represent this node
069     * @param action action to perform to initialize the created node
070     * @return a new node
071     */
072    @NonNull
073    static AttributedConfigurationNode root(@NonNull String tagName, Consumer<? super AttributedConfigurationNode> action) {
074        return root(tagName, ConfigurationOptions.defaults(), action);
075    }
076
077    /**
078     * Create a new node with no parent, a specified tag name, and specific options.
079     *
080     * @param tagName The name of the tag to be used to represent this node
081     * @param options The options to use within this node
082     * @return a new node
083     */
084    @NonNull
085    static AttributedConfigurationNode root(@NonNull String tagName, @NonNull ConfigurationOptions options) {
086        return new SimpleAttributedConfigurationNode(tagName, null, null, options);
087    }
088
089    /**
090     * Create a new node with no parent, a specified tag name, and specific options, and perform an action with it in scope
091     *
092     * @param tagName The name of the tag to be used to represent this node
093     * @param options The options to use within this node
094     * @param action action to perform to initialize the created node
095     * @return a new node
096     */
097    @NonNull
098    static AttributedConfigurationNode root(@NonNull String tagName, @NonNull ConfigurationOptions options, Consumer<? super AttributedConfigurationNode> action) {
099        AttributedConfigurationNode ret = root(tagName, options);
100        action.accept(ret);
101        return ret;
102    }
103
104    /**
105     * Gets the tag name of this node.
106     *
107     * @return The tag name
108     */
109    @NonNull
110    String getTagName();
111
112    /**
113     * Sets the tag name of this node.
114     *
115     * <p>Will have no effect when called on nodes which are direct values of a
116     * {@link #getChildrenMap() child map}, as the corresponding key is used as
117     * the tag name.</p>
118     *
119     * @param name The name to set, cannot be null
120     * @return this
121     */
122    @NonNull
123    AttributedConfigurationNode setTagName(@NonNull String name);
124
125    /**
126     * Adds an attribute to this node.
127     *
128     * @param name The name of the attribute
129     * @param value The value of the attribute
130     * @return this
131     */
132    @NonNull
133    AttributedConfigurationNode addAttribute(@NonNull String name, @NonNull String value);
134
135    /**
136     * Removes an attribute from this node.
137     *
138     * @param name The name of the attribute to remove
139     * @return this
140     */
141    @NonNull
142    AttributedConfigurationNode removeAttribute(@NonNull String name);
143
144    /**
145     * Sets the attributes of this node.
146     *
147     * @param attributes the attributes to set
148     * @return this
149     */
150    @NonNull
151    AttributedConfigurationNode setAttributes(@NonNull Map<String, String> attributes);
152
153    /**
154     * Gets if this node has any attributes.
155     *
156     * @return true if this node has any attributes
157     */
158    boolean hasAttributes();
159
160    /**
161     * Gets the value of an attribute, or null if this node doesn't have the
162     * given attribute.
163     *
164     * @param name The name of the attribute to get
165     * @return this
166     */
167    @Nullable
168    String getAttribute(@NonNull String name);
169
170    /**
171     * Gets the attributes this node has.
172     *
173     * <p>The returned map is immutable.</p>
174     *
175     * @return The map of attributes
176     */
177    @NonNull
178    Map<String, String> getAttributes();
179
180    // Methods from superclass overridden to have correct return types
181    @Nullable @Override AttributedConfigurationNode getParent();
182    @NonNull @Override List<? extends AttributedConfigurationNode> getChildrenList();
183    @NonNull @Override Map<Object, ? extends AttributedConfigurationNode> getChildrenMap();
184    @NonNull @Override AttributedConfigurationNode setComment(@Nullable String value);
185    @NonNull @Override AttributedConfigurationNode setValue(@Nullable Object value);
186    @NonNull @Override AttributedConfigurationNode mergeValuesFrom(@NonNull ConfigurationNode other);
187    @NonNull @Override @Deprecated AttributedConfigurationNode getAppendedNode();
188    @NonNull @Override AttributedConfigurationNode appendListNode();
189    @NonNull @Override AttributedConfigurationNode getNode(@NonNull Object... path);
190    @NonNull @Override AttributedConfigurationNode copy();
191
192    @Override
193    default AttributedConfigurationNode act(Consumer<? super ConfigurationNode> action) {
194        action.accept(this);
195        return this;
196    }
197}
